name: Birdie's adventure
description:
Its Birdies Great Adventure! Your mission is to dodge the Saws, and survive for as long as possible :)

This is my first Game i made as a project only to learn how stuff works and it was pretty fun!

Thanks to:
_Creepy_Cat for the bird
BayatGames for the Saw

4crain for the music
and Dustyroom for the soundeffects!

Feel free to download if ya like and leave a comment so i know what i can improve 
- Iceaqua
